H0.text: who missed the plane the day the music died. J.P. "The Big Bopper" Richardson Jr.'s manager

H1.text: who missed the plane the day the music died. Carl Bunch

H2.text: who missed the plane the day the music died. Frankie Avalon

H3.text: who missed the plane the day the music died. Tommy Allsup

A4.text: Allsup was touring with Holly, Ritchie Valens, and J.P. 'The Big Bopper' Richardson when he serendipitously lost a fateful coin toss with Valens for a seat on the plane that crashed, killing Valens, Holly, Richardson, and pilot Roger Peterson on February 3, 1959.
